protein.general_function: Involved in elongation factor-2 kinase activity
protein.specific_function: Phosphorylates eukaryotic elongation factor-2. Binds calmodulin

reference.reference_text: Ryazanov AG, Ward MD, Mendola CE, Pavur KS, Dorovkov MV, Wiedmann M, Erdjument-Bromage H, Tempst P, Parmer TG, Prostko CR, Germino FJ, Hait WN: Identification of a new class of protein kinases represented by eukaryotic elongation factor-2 kinase.
